Spells:
Aura Of Purity (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and Adv on saves vs. conditions for conc up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self may use a bonus action to restore 2d6 HP to target 1/rd for conc up to 1 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 [Oath Of The Crown] Evoc): R30' Self may use a bonus action to restore 2d6 HP to target 1/rd for conc up to 1 min
Banishing Smite (P5 Abju): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +5d10 HP force, plus banishment to home plane or a demiplane for conc up to 1 min if foe is reduced to 50 HP
Banishment (P4 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or a demiplane (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Branding Smite (P2 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights target for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Charm Person (S1 Ench): R30' Target regards you as a friend (Wisdom neg) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Circle Of Power (P5 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): Allies in a 30' radius gain Adv on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for conc up to 10 min
Command (P1 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Target obeys self one-word command (Wisdom neg) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Compelled Duel (P1 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R30' Target stays w/in 30' of self (Wisdom neg) and suffers Disadv on attacks on others for conc up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on target by an ally ends
Cure Wounds (P1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+2 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Elemental Weapon (P3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 attack and +2d4/+3d4 damage at level 5/7]
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in steed form
Fire Bolt (S0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Geas (P5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Geas (P5 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Guardian Of Faith (P4 [Oath Of The Crown] Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (Dexterity half) for 8 hr or 60 HP
Heroism (P1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +2 temporary HP each rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Self learns location of specified creature or species w/in 1000' for conc up to 1 hr
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Self learns location of a specified object or type w/in 1000' for conc up to 10 min
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Self may perform minor magic effects for 1 hr
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Remove Curse (P3 Abju): Frees touched from all curses
Spirit Guardians (P3 [Oath Of The Crown] Conj): 15' radius inflicts 3d8 HP necrotic or radiant (Wisdom half) and half Speed for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack w/in conc up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, Disadv on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and no Reaction for 1 rd
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and 10' push (Strength HP only) for conc up to 1 min
Warding Bond (P2 [Oath Of The Crown] Abju): Touched gains +1 AC, +1 saves, and resistance to all damage while within 60' of self, and self also suffers any damage to touched, for 1 hr
Zone Of Truth (P2 [Oath Of The Crown] Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (Charisma neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Sorcerer): Knows 2 S0 spells/May cast chosen S1 spell 1/long rest
Cleansing Touch: May dispel a spell effect on a touched willing creature 2/long rest
Divine Sense: R60' May discern location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 3/long rest
Elemental Adept (Acid): Acid spells ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Lay On Hands: May heal 100 HP/long rest; may use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Spell Sniper: Dbl attack spell range/Spells ignore 3/4 cover/Knows an additional attack cantrip
Turn The Tide: R30' May use Channel Divinity to restore 1d6+2 HP to targets w/fewer than half HP
